name: Brock Crocodile
storyline: Things are amiss on Crocodillian Island after the four most wanted criminals end up vanishing without a trace from the law. Brock Crocodile, an archaeologist who loves a bit of adventure, finds himself in the middle of all the action as an unearthly being begins a plot that it more than meets the eye. It’s up to Brock and his friends to find out what these cunning villains are planning and put a stop to their evil schemes!
